AutoVariable.label: Aim key
AutoVariable.tooltip: Key which needs to be pressed to activate the action below.

AutoVariable.label: Silent
AutoVariable.tooltip: Stops your crosshair from moving on your screen.

LabeledObject.label: Spectator mode
LabeledObject.tooltip: How should aimbot react to spectators?

Option.name: Firstperson
Option.tooltip: Disable if at least one spectator is in firstperson.

Option.name: Spectated
Option.tooltip: Disable if you are being spectated in first- or thirdperson.

AutoVariable.label: FOV
AutoVariable.tooltip: Restricts the aimbot to a certain FOV from the crosshair.

AutoVariable.label: FOV circle
AutoVariable.tooltip: Shows the aimbot's FOV.

AutoVariable.label: Only shoot when able
AutoVariable.tooltip: Enables a special mode for the Grenade Launcher and Huntsman.

AutoVariable.label: Miss chance
AutoVariable.tooltip: % chance the aimbot will miss on purpose.

AutoVariable.label: Extrapolate
AutoVariable.tooltip: Predict where the target will be.

AutoVariable.label: Zoomed only
AutoVariable.tooltip: If applicable, the aimbot will only shoot if you are scoped in.

AutoVariable.label: Enable autoshoot
AutoVariable.tooltip: The aimbot will automatically shoot at enemies.

AutoVariable.label: Wait for charge
AutoVariable.tooltip: Hold fire until a single shot is enough to kill the target.

AutoVariable.label: Autoshoot disguised
AutoVariable.tooltip: Enable autoshoot while you are disguised

AutoVariable.label: Auto spin-up
AutoVariable.tooltip: Spin up the minigun automatically if an enemy is found.

AutoVariable.label: Auto zoom
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically scope in when enemies are near.

LabeledObject.label: Priority mode
LabeledObject.tooltip: If multiple enemies are in FOV, who should aimbot target?

LabeledObject.label: Target team
LabeledObject.tooltip: Which team should be targeted by the aimbot?

LabeledObject.label: Hitbox mode
LabeledObject.tooltip: Auto: intelligently pick hitbox based upon enemy health. Auto closest: hitbox closest to crosshair. Static: hitbox set below.

LabeledObject.label: Hitbox
LabeledObject.tooltip: Only used if hitbox mode is set to static.

AutoVariable.label: Max range
AutoVariable.tooltip: Max aimbot range (hammer units).

AutoVariable.label: Multipoint
AutoVariable.tooltip: Uses multiple hitbox positons.

AutoVariable.label: Assistance only
AutoVariable.tooltip: Aimbot is only active if your mouse has moved in the last half second.

AutoVariable.label: Lock target
AutoVariable.tooltip: Lock onto a target until they die or leave your fov.

AutoVariable.label: Rage only
AutoVariable.tooltip: Only target enemies set to RAGE.

AutoVariable.label: Aim at other buildings
AutoVariable.tooltip: Target dispensers and teleporters.

AutoVariable.label: No spread
AutoVariable.tooltip: Projectiles won't have any spread. Independent of aimbot.

AutoVariable.label: Gravity override
AutoVariable.tooltip: Override automatically found gravity value.

AutoVariable.label: Velocity override
AutoVariable.tooltip: Override automatically found projectile speed.

AutoVariable.label: Enable backtracking
AutoVariable.tooltip: Allow hitting enemies where they were in the past.

AutoVariable.label: Aim at backtracking
AutoVariable.tooltip: Aim at backtrack ticks

AutoVariable.label: Draw backtrack
AutoVariable.tooltip: Draw ticks on screen

AutoVariable.label: Backtrack chams
AutoVariable.tooltip: Draw chams for the ticks (note that transparent viewmodels make them transparent if the entity being backtracked walks off-screen)

AutoVariable.label: Chams amount
AutoVariable.tooltip: How many ticks to draw (WARNING, this can cause lag)

AutoVariable.label: Chams color
AutoVariable.tooltip: Color for the chams.

AutoVariable.label: Solid color
AutoVariable.tooltip: Draw a solid color instead of tinting the model
